0871A46B.Toast: Carry a father's dying wish to his daughter.

B12EDDB8.Phase21Description: The miner was keeping his daughter's old doll safe.  I should deliver it to her in Alzuuda along with news of her father's fate.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: I found a dead miner in Qara Yisu.  His letter indicates he was keeping something for his daughter.  I should find it and take it to her.
